content: Career HDB BTO Savings Retirement CPF AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018What is the min salary (eg non-grad below median) one needs to earn to attend 0.5M per pax? Even with $7k/annum to RSTU, is 0.5M65 per pax attainable? (single who will use OA to buy a 2rm BTO at 35)?To ask how can people below median income attain 0.5M65 per pax, especially for non-grad, even with annual RSTU. What is the minimum salary to be practical to attain 0.5M65 per pax.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 07 Nov 2018Using a calculator, to achieve $500k in 30years time, one will require to save $720 every month while getting 4% return on the money. You can just work backwards to add expenses needed monthly to come up with a ballpark figure. 0 comments0
